title: Canada - average working hours per week 2019
yAxis: Number of employed person in thousands
summary: This is a bar chart representing Average usual weekly hours in the x axis and Number of employed person in thousands in the y axis.
Average usual weekly hours 40 hours has the highest Number of employed person in thousands and 41 to 49 hours has the lowest Number of employed person in thousands.
The highest Average usual weekly hours 40 hours has 6238.3 more Number of employed person in thousands than the lowest Average usual weekly hours 41 to 49 hours.
min_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Average usual weekly hours, and Number of employed person in thousands in each Average usual weekly hours on the y axis.
The Number of employed person in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Average usual weekly hours 40 hours and lowest at Average usual weekly hours 41 to 49 hours.
